welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful McLean, known for its charming neighborhoods and rich history. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights and is the hub for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue, Southwest Airlines, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the largest concourse at Washington Dulles International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a smaller concourse at Washington Dulles International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limited free option and a faster paid option for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
